quotes: Be Brave and Take Risks: You need to have faith in yourself. Be brave and take risks. You don't have to have it all figured out to move forward.
A Quitter never wins ? and ? a Winner never quits.
Take care of your body. It's the only place you have to live.
If there's a definition of freedom, I think it's this: living life on your terms.
Always show more kindness than seems necessary because the person receiving it needs it more than you will ever know.
A person is only by the thoughts that he chooses.
Some people find fault like there is a reward for it.
Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently.
Blessed is he who expects nothing, for he shall be disappointed.
Becoming a great leader doesn't mean being perfect. it means living with your imperfections.
When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.
Investing in yourself is the best investment you will ever make.
Never fear quarrels, but seek hazardous adventures.
The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
I can live without money, but I cannot live without love.
Today you are you, that is truer than true. There is no one alive who is you-er than you.
Be mindful. Be grateful. Be positive. Be true. Be kind.
Emancipate yourself from mental slavery, none but ourselves can free our mind.
A leader leads by example, not by force.
If you are far from the enemy, make him believe you are near.
As a man thinketh in his heart, so shall he be.
Darkness is the absence of light.
If I can stop one heart from breaking, I shall not live in vain.
An inventor is a man who asks Why? of the universe and lets nothing stand between the answer and his mind.
Life goes by fast. Enjoy it. Calm down. It's all funny.
Pursue what catches your heart, not what catches your eyes.
Peace begins with a smile.
When you're at the end of your rope, tie a knot and hold on.
There can be no deep disappointment where there is not deep love.
Human happiness and moral duty are inseparably connected.
The price of inaction is far greater than the cost of making a mistake.
Formal education will make you a living, self-education will make you a fortune.
Do something to move yourself toward your major goal every day.
Nothing is impossible. The word itself says 'I'm possible!'
When reading, only read. When eating, only eat. When thinking, only think.
Disobedience is the true foundation of liberty. The obedient must be slaves.
Mistake is a mistake only if you make it twice.
Life is too short to waste your time on people who don't respect, appreciate, and value you.
You are the only problem you will ever have and you are the only solution.
To improve is to change, so to be perfect is to change often.
As soon as you truly commit to making something happen, the ?how' will reveal itself.
Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
You're only given a little spark of madness. You mustn't lose it.
Any fool can turn a blind eye but who knows what the ostrich sees in the sand.
It always seems impossible until it's done.
Think and wonder, wonder and think.
If you run you stand a chance of losing, but if you don't run you've already lost.
Go for it now. The future is promised to no one.
There's no coming to consciousness without pain
Life is about choice. You can choose to be a victim or anything else you like to be.
